SEARCH
Package seng201.team53.game

Class GameEnvironment

java.lang.Object
seng201.team53.game.GameEnvironment
public class GameEnvironment extends Object
The overarching, main class of the game This class is a Singleton; use .getGameEnvironment() to get the instance of this class and all its subcomponents;

  • Method Details

    • load

      public void load()
      Loads the game environment. This includes initialising the asset loader, random events, map and creating the first round

    • setupNextRound

      public void setupNextRound()
      Sets up the next round of the game

    • beginRound

      public void beginRound()
      Begins the current round

    • completeRound

      public void completeRound()
      Completes the current round. This method will run the current rounds end actions

    • init

      public static GameEnvironment init(GameController controller, String playerName, int rounds, GameDifficulty difficulty)
      Constructs a new game environment and initialises the singleton After calling this function, call GameEnvironment#load();
      Parameters:
      controller - The game controller
      playerName - The players name
      rounds - The number of rounds to be played
      difficulty - The game difficulty
      Returns:
      The game environment
